import React, { useState } from 'react' import NavBar from './NavBar' import { useLoaderData } from 'react-router' import ReactModal from 'react-modal'; const Home = () => { const tasks = useLoaderData(); const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault } return ( <>
Tasks
{ tasks.map(task =>
{task.name}
{task.description &&
{task.description}
}
) }
handleSubmit(e)} className='flex flex-col w-96'>
